```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

### What to submit for Week 5

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "steelblue"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "steelblue"))

wk_post <- tibble(
"eCampus?" = c(unchecked, 
               checked, 
               checked,
               checked),

Description = c("Complete a module in Data Camp that covers factor analysis.",
               "Submit an analysis of a survey data using exploratory factor analysis.",
               "Perform some conditional and post analyses of your pilot data.",
               "Submit your Week 5 Reflections."),

Location = c("[Link](/lesson/05-lesson/#data-camp-1)", 
             "[Link](/example/05-example/#exploratory-factor-analysis-efa)",
             "[Link](/assignment/#anchorwk5)",
             "[Link](/readings/05-readings/#questions-to-reflect-on-1)")

)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(wk_post, 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'clc') %>%
  kable_styling(full_width = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "30em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "10em")
```
